Text: Read it and you'll find the truth.

Re-file as FANTASY.

Why? There's no corroboration of the existence of Jesus of Nazareth. Plenty of historical records, but no Jesus, no Nazareth even. This is a fairy tale. But haters gonna hate and believers gonna believe. Have fun avoiding sin, eh?

It is already expected that lots of people will hate, will not believe or reject this living testimonies and it is written, predicted in the scriptures. It is not a surprise but the Lord is waiting patiently to you guys. Just take a step and He will draw near to you. Let Him fix you and that will be the most important decision that you will be making for your whole life!
